attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should stand up as a nation and abolish the T.V. license in this wonderful country!
In this day and age we should be able to pay for a channel if we want it especialy when everything turns completely digital which has already started in the U.K. town of Whitehaven in Cumbria already having its signal turned off and is now digital only!

The T.V. license was pushed upon this nation now we should push it upon the government to abolish this very out dated ludicrous system!

Please vote now and we can make this happen!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
